TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HtmlTableRowCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class HtmlTableRowCollection Implements ICollection
public ref class HtmlTableRowCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection
type HtmlTableRowCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 对象的集合，这些对象表示 控件中的行。

span.span: A collection of objects that represent the rows of an control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类以编程方式管理 对象的集合，这些对象表示 控件中的行。Use the class to programmatically manage a collection of objects that represent the rows in an control. 此类通常用于在 控件中添加、移除或修改行的内容。This class is commonly used to add, remove, or modify the contents of a row in an control. > [!NOTE] > 控件包含一个 属性，该属性表示 对象的集合。An control contains a property that represents a collection of objects. 每个 都表示表中的单个行。Each represents an individual row in the table. 包含一个 属性，该属性表示 对象的集合。An contains a property that represents a collection of objects. 这些对象又分别表示表的各个单元。These objects, in turn, represent the individual cells of the table. 若要检索单个单元，请首先从 控件的 集合中获取表示该单元格所在行的 对象。To retrieve an individual cell, first get the object, representing the row containing the cell, from the collection of the control. 然后，可以从 的 集合中获取表示行中单元格的 对象。You can then get the object, representing the cell in the row, from the collection of the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过向 集合添加行来动态生成 控件的内容。The following code example demonstrates how to dynamically generate the contents of an control by adding rows to an collection. 请注意，表的 属性是 对象。Notice that the property of a table is the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRowCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowCollection/CS/htmltablerowcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRowCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowCollection/VB/htmltablerowcollectionvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Appends the specified object to the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可将指定 对象添加到 集合的末尾。Use this method to add the specified object to the end of an collection. 若要在集合的中间插入 ，请使用 方法。To insert an in the middle of the collection, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法将一个表的行（由 对象表示）追加到 集合的末尾。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to append a row of a table, represented by an object, to the end of an collection. 请注意，表的 属性是 对象。Notice that the property of a table is the object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法从 集合中删除所有 对象，并重置 属性为 `0`。Use this method to remove all objects from the collection and reset the property to `0`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法从 集合中删除所有项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to remove all items from the collection. 然后，新项将添加到集合并显示在 控件中。New entries are then added to the collection and displayed in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法将 集合的内容复制到指定的 对象中，从数组中的指定索引处开始复制。Use this method to copy the contents of the collection into the specified object, starting at the specified index in the array. > [!NOTE] > `array` 参数必须是从零开始的 。The `array` parameter must be a zero-based . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法来创建一个数组，该数组包含与 集合相同的内容。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create an array that contains the same contents as the collection. 然后循环访问该数组，以显示集合的内容。The array is then iterated through to display the contents of the collection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定 集合中包含的行数。Use the property to determine the number of rows contained in the collection. 当循环访问集合以确定上限时，通常使用 属性。The property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine the upper bound. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定 控件中的行数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the number of rows in the control. 然后，将此值用作循环的上限，以循环访问表中的行。This value is then used as the upper bound of a loop to iterate through the rows of a table. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法创建一个 实现的对象，该对象可循环访问以获取 集合中的每个项。Use this method to create an -implemented object that can be iterated through to get each item in the collection. 使用 属性获取集合中的当前元素。Use the property to get the current element in the collection. 使用 方法移动到集合中的下一项。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 使用 方法将枚举数移到初始位置。Use the method to move the enumerator to the initial position. > [!NOTE] > 创建一个已实现 的对象之后，或在使用 方法将枚举数移到集合中的第一项之后，必须调用 方法。You must call the method after creating an -implemented object, or after using the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection. 否则， 属性表示的项是不确定的。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法创建 对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create an object. 然后循环访问 对象以显示 集合的内容。The object is then iterated through to display the contents of the collection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此索引器可使用简单数组表示法，从位于指定索引处的 集合中获取单个 对象。Use this indexer to get an individual object from the collection at a specified index, using simple array notation. > [!NOTE] > 集合从零开始;因此，该集合中的第一个元素包含 `0`的索引值。The collection is zero-based; therefore, the first element in the collection contains an index value of `0`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用索引器从 集合中检索由 对象表示的表行。The following code example demonstrates how to use the indexer to retrieve a table row, represented by an object, from the collection. 然后，将用新内容更新该行中的单元格。The cells in the row are then updated with new content. 请注意，表的 属性是 对象。Notice that the property of the table is the object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法从 集合中删除位于指定索引处的 对象。Use this method to remove the object at the specified index from the collection. 索引号从零开始。The index number is zero-based. 因此，该集合中的第一项的索引值为 `0`。Therefore, the first item in the collection has an index value of `0`. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定的索引超出了索引值范围，则会引发异常。If you specify an index that is outside the range of index values, an exception is raised. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法从 集合中删除位于指定索引处的项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to remove the item at the specified index from the collection. 此示例将删除 控件的第一行。This example removes the first row of the control.
